alert.note: Alert for Butler; Cape Girardeau; Ripley (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 24 at 2:10AM CST until January 25 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Sharp gradients of little snowfall to significant snowfall across a few miles. * WHERE...Portions of southern Illinois and southeast Missouri. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will be rather strong and gusty. The combination of gusty winds and heavy wet snow could stress power lines.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
